forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 58F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain this evening with thunderstorms by morning. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain this evening with thunderstorms by morning. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning with numerous thunderstorms developing in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning with thunderstorms developing in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers with a possible thunderstorm in the evening, then variable clouds overnight with still a chance of showers. Low 9C. S winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers with a possible thunderstorm in the evening, then variable clouds overnight with still a chance of showers. Low 48F. S winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 13C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High near 55F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 5C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 42F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 50F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime after midnight. Low 7C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy in the evening then periods of showers after midnight. Low near 45F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 54F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low near 45F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 59F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 48F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 58F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.
